subject: Assaults
Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Police
lead_paragraph: After an assault outside Dodger Stadium left a Giants fan in a coma, team officials and the Los Angeles police chief delivered on their promise of a “sea of blue” response.
snippet: After an assault outside Dodger Stadium left a Giants fan in a coma, team officials and the Los Angeles police chief delivered on their promise of a “sea of blue” response.
